title: (x) "Opportunity" sans with semi-rounded corners - Domestos Sans {Mr. Red}
content:
Thanks in advance…

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Oppurtunity.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403073801/http:/typophile.com/files/Oppurtunity.jpg) | 69.8 KB |
author: R27

comments.content:
That looks like the typeface used for ‘Nectar’ card and publicity in the UK. I suspect it may be custom, but that’s only a guess.

Nick Cooke

Thanks for your input Nick,

I’m stumped mate. I’ve seen the nectar stuff. It may be!
Looks like the work of [Hubert Jocham](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403073801/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/index.php/type/sans/) but I don’t see it on his site.
What is the source of this sample?

I’ve cracked it.

it’s Domestos Sans, which also comes in a serif by T26. I like it alot, not so sure about the serif though.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/domestos-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403073801/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/domestos-sans/)

Thanks again for everyones help.

R.
